long_description: Walking all day in the comfortable and casual Sanuk Donna Shoes will leave a permanent smile on your face. Built with sandal footbeds, canvas uppers and polyester linings, the Donna is part of Sanuk's Sidewalk Surfer line. Loose-fitting uppers allow feet to move and spread for natural shock absorption and stability. EVA midsoles offer ample cushioning and a stable platform to walk on; soft EVA footbeds feature AEGIS(R) antimicrobial additive to help deter odors. All-synthetic construction makes these vegan-friendly. Closeout.
short_description: Walking all day in the comfortable and casual Sanuk Donna Shoes will leave a permanent smile on your face.
